message.content:
<teammate-message teammate_id="team-lead" summary="Answer the context check — which files?">
You didn't answer my context check question. Please respond directly to me (team-lead), not to editor.

List exactly which files you have in your context:
1. Which of the 8+1 source essays? (list filenames)
2. Whose Analysis Report do you have loaded?
</teammate-message>
